README:
Peerduct
========

 - Bittorrent DHT
   - bt_dht.c
   - DHT, Kademlia based.
 - tribbler
   - extentions to Bittorrent DHT.
 - Kad (ed2k)
   - DHT, Kademlia based.
 - Vuze
   - DHT
 - overnet (ed2k)
 - gnunet
 - freenet
 - gnutella
   - has a DHT as an extention
 - gnutella2
 - https://gitweb.torproject.org/torspec.git/tree/tor-spec.txt
 

- DHTs
 - pastry
 - chord
 - OpenDHT (ring, https://blog.savoirfairelinux.com/en/2015/ring-opendht-a-distributed-hash-table/)
 - ipfs
 - sipping-p2p: (also lists some others) https://www.ietf.org/proceedings/65/slides/plenaryt-2.pdf
 - DDNS, CoDoNS
 - Beehive
 
- Auth
